RelatedSentence: Autolite ( India ) Ltd has informed BSE that the meeting of board of directors shall be held on May 29 , 2014 , to consider and take on record the Audited results for the year ended on March 31 , 2014 .
Accordingly , the Promoters , Directors and Designated Employees have been advised to not to deal in the securities of the Company during the mentioned period .
